channel.title: Enlarge the screen size?
channel.description: ok so ive been working with my client for a while and i now have 3 new magic menus with all custom spells and a whole lot of other stuff and i had a beta release the other day and i had like 30 different people log on and tell me i should make it full screen can anyone help?

item.title: Enlarge the screen size?
